field.name: tolerance
field.condition: body_serial_type == PRC_TYPE_TOPO_BrepDataCompress || body_serial_type == PRC_TYPE_TOPO_SingleWireBodyCompress || body_serial_type == PRC_TYPE_TESS_3D_Compress

field.name: point_on_torus
field.condition: all_loops_are_vertex_loops == TRUE && surface_type == PRC_HCG_AnaTorus && is_trimmed == TRUE
